summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein discussing a significant financial deal related to the Ford TALF. It indicates a need for further discussion the following day.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating his involvement in financial dealings.

keyFacts: The email was sent by Jeffrey Epstein from his Gmail account.
The subject of the email references a significant financial deal involving Ford TALF.
Epstein expresses a desire to discuss the deal further the next day.
